workflow.name: Install WF - ADD Trigger Reusable WF
workflow.title: Install WF - ADD Trigger Reusable WF

properties.name: installed_wf_ID
properties.description: Provide the Xchange ID which user want to install, or This  can be obtained from the Install reusable workflow.

properties.name: Provide the Request_Content_type
properties.description:
This is applicable when user creating event of Webhook type and below are the Supported Content Type -- 
application/json,
application/x-www-form-urlencoded,
application/json; charset=utf-8,
application/xml

properties.name: Add Trigger to Installed WF Test Status
Trigger_Condition_type
properties.description:
Trigger condition type should be one of item from below list. 
rule-schedule, 
rule-wh,
rule-apr,
rule-email
rule-st
rule-pr

properties.name: Input_Token
properties.description: Provide the token of tenant where user want to install the exchange.

properties.name: trigger_enable_disable_flag
properties.description:
flag should be true or false 

true -- started-polling
false -- disabled
Reuable WF for Add Trigger to Installed WF
properties.display_name: Install WF - ADD Trigger Reusable WF
